'''Mythcon 45''' was the forty-fifth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "Where Fantasy Fits"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' Ursula Vernon (writer and artist), and [[Richard C. West]] (Inklings scholar)
